sentences.english: He is neither an eunuch nor a satyr.
Eunuchs were once members of the elite in many societies.
sentences.chinese: 閹人曾經在許多社會中是精英中的成員。

sentences.english: Jinchang angry one house is a eunuch, the incense borrow fainted to escape.
sentences.chinese: 金昌氣憤一屋都是閹人，金香借暈倒逃避窘境。

sentences.english: The etymology of "eunuch" is the Greek word for "bed keeper.
sentences.chinese: 英語中“閹人”一詞起源於希臘語“守護牀鋪的人。”

sentences.english: The site contains castration and eunuch topics and is for adults only.
sentences.chinese: 本網頁包含閹割和閹人題材的內容，只限成年人瀏覽。

definition: lit. killing the chicken to warn the monkey (idiom)/fig. to punish an individual as an example to others/pour encourager les autres
lit. to settle accounts after autumn/settle scores at an opportune moment (idiom)
lit. neither a relative nor a friend (idiom)/fig. unrelated to one another in any way
child bride/girl adopted into a family as future daughter-in-law
to make a fool of oneself
please excuse me for not complying/to politely decline
all crows are black (idiom)/evil people are bad all over the world
pinyin: tian1 xia4 wu1 ya1 yi1 ban1 hei1

definition: to take refuge in religious life
